name: CUST_ID_ADDRESS_STREET
description: This table contains the street address lines from the address associated with a customer ID type document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RX_CUST_ID_STREET
columns.description: The street component of the address from the customer ID.
